Description:
You can now react to messages and posts with multiple emojis per message, enhancing your ability to express a wide range of emotions effectively. Use combinations of emojis for a richer and more nuanced response, quickly conveying your feelings and thoughts, like agreement, urgency or sentiment, without extra repliesâ€”keeping discussions focused and efficient.
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple Emoji Reactions per message
